title: Simple Chicken Mayo with Parmesan and Bread Crumbs Recipe
description: This chicken breast recipe with mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, and herbs is incredibly juicy and delicious, plus quick and easy to make!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Breast Simple Chicken Mayo with Parmesan and Bread Crumbs 4.8 (131) 108 Reviews 14 Photos This chicken breast recipe with mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, and herbs is a true tried-and-tested recipe! I remember seeing an ad on TV about cooking with mayonnaise and decided to give it a shot. I've made it with just the mayonnaise on top and it really locks the moisture into the chicken. The bread crumbs and cheese are a must for me; they complement each other very well. By EmmieYum Updated on March 13, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 14 14 14 14 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Total Time: 30 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts 2 ½ tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, or more to taste 2 tablespoons bread crumbs, or more to taste 1 ½ teaspoons herbes de Provence Directions Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Place chicken breasts in a baking pan. Mix Parmesan cheese and mayonnaise together in a bowl until well combined; spread evenly over chicken breasts. Coat with bread crumbs and sprinkle with herbes de Provence. Bake in the preheated oven until chicken breasts are no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 20 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Chef Mo I Made It Print 404 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 272 Calories 16g Fat 6g Carbs 26g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 2 Calories 272 % Daily Value * Total Fat 16g 20% Saturated Fat 4g 18% Cholesterol 72mg 24% Sodium 273mg 12% Total Carbohydrate 6g 2% Dietary Fiber 0g 1% Total Sugars 1g Protein 26g 53% Calcium 93mg 7% Iron 1mg 6% Potassium 170mg 4% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Simple Chicken Mayo with Parmesan and Bread Crumbs 01 of 14 Photo by  Chef Mo 02 of 14 Photo by  Linette 04/06/2025 Easy to follow Great flavors Family favorite Very tasty! Followed recipe but based on three breasts instead of two. Loved the comp of mayo and cheese. It held together and bread crumbs and my herb, Tarragon crusted perfectly. Thank you for a family favorite! 03 of 14 Photo by  Chef Mo 03/08/2025 A keeper! Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Great flavors Worth the effort Family favorite So simple with a nice flavor making the chicken not dry at all. 04 of 14 Photo by  CamelGal34 08/14/2023 My husband loved this. I did add lemon pepper on the chicken and put some garlic powder in the Mayo mixture. Will make again. 05 of 14 Photo by  Rachael 10/26/2021 Utterly delicious. I used Tuscan seasoning & kept the chicken in a little longer for extra crunch. Highly recommend this recipe! 06 of 14 Photo by  Liz Kuzma 09/22/2019 07 of 14 Photo by  Ivelisse Vega 04/28/2019 08 of 14 Photo by  Lisa Rowe 09/09/2018 09 of 14 Photo by  Emily Rose Carver 09/21/2017 This was delicious! Very moist and easy to make. I didn't have the spices mentioned, but instead used a pinch of chili power, cayanne pepper, oregano, and garlic power. Will make again! 10 of 14 Photo by  Ihateonions 08/03/2017 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Chicken Breast Wrapped in Bacon 32 Ratings Sriracha Honey Chicken 58 Ratings Quick Meal-Prep Chicken 1 Rating BBQ Chicken Pouches 5 Ratings Easy Garlic Ginger Chicken 110 Ratings Honey Glazed Chicken 558 Ratings Crispy Chicken Tenders 3 Ratings Simple Broiled Chicken Breasts 1 Rating Easy Creamy Peppercorn Chicken 120 Ratings Juicy Chicken 32 Ratings Easy Baked Chicken Tenders 75 Ratings Maple-Pecan-Crusted Chicken 12 Ratings Crunchy Lemon-Garlic-Parmesan Chicken Tenders 1 Rating Broiled Paprika and Lemon-Pepper Chicken Breasts 19 Ratings Angela's Easy Breaded Chicken 374 Ratings Emergency Chicken 471 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: EmmieYum
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Place chicken breasts in a baking pan.;Mix Parmesan cheese and mayonnaise together in a bowl until well combined; spread evenly over chicken breasts. Coat with bread crumbs and sprinkle with herbes de Provence.;Bake in the preheated oven until chicken breasts are no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 20 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Chef Mo
